title: Predict H1N1 and Seasonal Flu Vaccines
description: Predict whether people got H1N1 and seasonal flu vaccines using information they shared about their backgrounds, opinions, and health behaviors, using DrivenData datasets.

title: Personal Book Recommendations System
description: A personalized recommendation engine designed to help me find books based on my preferences and reading history. The dataset was scrapped from french websites.

title: Automated Summarization of Long Documents
description: Developing and evaluating automated summarization models to effectively summarize long documents. It combines traditional and advanced Transformer-based approaches to meet the requirement.
